title: NASA Welcomes 15th Administrator Jared Isaacman
description: Jared Isaacman was sworn in Thursday as NASA’s 15th administrator by District Judge Timothy J. Kelly. The oath was taken during a ceremony held at the Eisenhower Executive Office Building in Washington.  As NASA administrator, Isaacman will lead the agency in bold pursuit of exploration, innovation, and scientific discovery.  “I am deeply honored to be sworn […]
